p: Our study also provides clarity on the identity of Prosopis species in Eastern Africa. Firstly, our genetic results confirmed the presence of P. juliflora in Ethiopia, Kenya and Tanzania. Our results using native and non-native genetic material, together with previous work from the native range ( Catalano et al. 2008 ; Palacios et al. 2012 ), also indicate important genetic differences between P. pallida and P. juliflora, confirming that they are indeed distinct taxa. Secondly, we identified a few instances of hybridization between these two species. These hybrids are likely to be triploid and sterile and therefore unlikely to increase invasiveness.
